headline: Has Simon Property Group’s Strong Multi Year Rally Already Priced In Future Growth?
summary: Wondering if Simon Property Group is still a smart buy after its huge run, or if you are late to the party? Here is a breakdown of what the current share price is really implying about potential future returns. The stock has climbed 1.7% over the last week, 2.7% over the past month, and is now up 6.7% year to date, adding to a 13.3% gain over 1 year and 84.6% and 186.2% over 3 and 5 years respectively. Behind those moves, investors have been watching how Simon navigates the long term shift...
